tooltip.title: Create New Case
tooltip.content: Open a wizard to register a new GST litigation case. You'll enter client details, case type, court jurisdiction, and initial stage information.

buttons.label: Advance Stage
buttons.explanation: Move case to next lifecycle stage

tooltip.title: Advance Case Stage
tooltip.content: Progress the case to the next stage in the GST litigation lifecycle. System validates prerequisites and generates required tasks automatically.

tooltip.title: Mark Case Complete
tooltip.content: Close this case and archive all related documents, tasks, and hearings. This action can be reversed if needed.

tooltip.title: Export Case Data
tooltip.content: Export case details, documents, tasks, and timeline to Excel or PDF format for reporting or archival purposes.

cards.label: Case Overview
cards.explanation: Summary of case details and current status

tooltip.title: Case Overview Card
tooltip.content: Displays case number, client name, current stage, priority, assigned team, and key dates at a glance.

tooltip.title: Add New Client
tooltip.content: Create a new client master record with PAN, GSTIN, contact details, and billing information. Use GST API for auto-fill if enabled.

tooltip.title: Import Clients
tooltip.content: Bulk import client records from Excel or CSV. Map columns to fields and validate data before import.

tooltip.title: Export Clients
tooltip.content: Export all client records to Excel format with selected columns and filters applied.

buttons.label: New Task
buttons.explanation: Add a task to track work

tooltip.title: Create Task
tooltip.content: Create a standalone task or link it to a case. Assign to team members, set priority, due date, and estimated hours.

tooltip.title: AI Task Assistant
tooltip.content: Leverages AI to suggest task breakdowns, time estimates, dependencies, and optimal assignment based on team workload and case context.

tooltip.title: Task Board
tooltip.content: View tasks in a Kanban board layout organized by status. Drag and drop to update status and reorder priorities.

tooltip.title: Task Templates
tooltip.content: Create and manage task templates for common workflows. Templates auto-populate task details based on case stage and type.

tooltip.title: Task Analytics
tooltip.content: View team productivity metrics, task completion rates, bottlenecks, and time tracking analytics.

tooltip.title: Upload Document
tooltip.content: Upload PDFs, Word docs, spreadsheets, or images. Link to cases, tag for search, and organize into folders automatically.

tooltip.title: AI Draft Assistant
tooltip.content: Use AI to generate replies, objections, petitions, and other legal documents based on case context and templates.

tooltip.title: Create Folder
tooltip.content: Create a new folder to organize documents by case, stage, or custom categories. Set access permissions per folder.

tooltip.title: Form Templates
tooltip.content: Access pre-built templates for GSTAT, DRC-01, ASMT-10, and other GST forms. Auto-fill from case data.

buttons.label: Schedule Hearing
buttons.explanation: Book a court date and time

tooltip.title: Schedule Hearing
tooltip.content: Create hearing entry with date, time, court, judge, purpose, and agenda. System syncs with calendar and sends reminders.

tooltip.title: Calendar View
tooltip.content: View all scheduled hearings in a monthly calendar. Click dates to see hearing details and add new hearings.

tooltip.title: List View
tooltip.content: View hearings in a sortable, filterable list format. Export to Excel or sync with external calendars.

tooltip.title: Calendar Integration
tooltip.content: Sync hearings with Google Calendar or Outlook. Automatic two-way sync keeps all calendars updated.

tooltip.title: Generate Report
tooltip.content: Generate custom reports with selected metrics, date ranges, and filters. Export to PDF or Excel.

tooltip.title: Case Reports
tooltip.content: View case-level metrics including stage distribution, completion rates, and average case duration.

tooltip.title: Hearing Reports
tooltip.content: Analyze hearing outcomes, judge performance, adjournment rates, and court-wise statistics.

tooltip.title: Timeline Breach Report
tooltip.content: Identify cases and tasks that missed deadlines. View breach reasons and patterns to improve compliance.

tooltip.title: RBAC Management
tooltip.content: Define roles (Partner, CA, Staff), assign permissions, and control access to sensitive case data and admin functions.

tooltip.title: Storage Configuration
tooltip.content: Choose storage mode: Browser (IndexedDB), API (backend), or Hybrid. Affects data persistence and sync behavior.

tooltip.title: Data Management
tooltip.content: Import and export all system data, create backups, and restore from previous snapshots.

tooltip.title: Global Parameters
tooltip.content: Set organization-wide defaults for case numbering, task priorities, reminder schedules, and notification preferences.

tooltip.title: Calendar Integration
tooltip.content: Configure Google Calendar or Outlook integration for automatic hearing sync across your organization.

tooltip.title: Pending Tasks
tooltip.content: View all tasks assigned to you or your team with upcoming deadlines. Click to view task details or mark complete.

tooltip.title: Upcoming Hearings
tooltip.content: Hearings scheduled in the next 7 days. Includes court, time, and case details. Click to view full hearing information.

tooltip.title: Active Cases
tooltip.content: Total number of cases currently in progress across all stages. Click to filter by stage or priority.

tooltip.title: Timeline Breach Alerts
tooltip.content: Cases and tasks that have missed statutory deadlines or internal due dates. Requires immediate attention.
